hero.heading: Careers
hero.subheading: Supporting maritime industries with world-class solutions and a network spanning 19 key ports in Malaysia

joinus.title: Join Us in Driving Excellence
joinus.description: At TMD Energy Limited, we are always on the lookout for passionate individuals to fuel our mission of innovation, sustainability, and operational excellence in the energy sector. Join a collaborative and forward-thinking environment where your contributions make a real impact. Together, we empower industries and communities with reliable energy solutions.

careers.title: Senior Tyre Technician
careers.description: Join our expert team as a Senior Tyre Technician. You’ll be responsible for performing advanced tyre services, including alignment, balancing, and roadside assistance. Your role is crucial in ensuring that our clients’ fleets stay road-ready.
